script.name: !job.trade.docktrader
script.sourceplaintext:
[THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_FREETRADER $job.id = [THIS] -> get job id
if not random value from 0 to 8 - 1 = [THIS] -> install 1 units of Navigation Command Software MK1 = [THIS] -> install 1 units of Jumpdrive [THIS] ->set autojump active: [TRUE] [THIS] ->autojump minimum jumps= 3 [THIS] ->set jumpdrive fuel resupply: amount=40 end
if [THIS] -> get job leader START [THIS] -> delayed command COMMAND_DESTROY_THIS : arg1=null, arg2=null, arg3=null, arg4=100 return null end [THIS] ->connect ship command/signal COMMAND_FREETRADER to script !job.trade.docktrader with prio 0
$temp = random value from 20000 to 300000 - 1 if [THIS] -> is docked @ = wait $temp ms else if not [THIS] -> is in active sector @ = [THIS] -> move around $temp ms end
$jumps = [THIS] -> get job jump range if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay $buyrange = $jumps $jumps = $jumps + 3 else $buyrange = $jumps / 2 end $temp = [THIS] -> get homesector [THIS] ->set destination to $temp skip if ! $temp OR $temp == [SECTOR] @ $temp = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$temp [THIS] ->set destination to null $turns = 0 $bSellAt = null
$attempts = 0
$target.race = null if [OWNER] == ATF OR [OWNER] == Terran $target.race = Terran else if [OWNER] == Pirates $target.race = Pirates end
while [TRUE] inc $attempts = [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_FREETRADER [THIS] ->reset flight time @ = wait 1000 ms
gosub sub.CheckHull
* lets move to a new sector $temp = random value from 0 to 10 - 1 if $attempts > $temp if not random value from 0 to 20 - 1 $temp = [THIS] -> get homesector else $temp = find a random sector: startsector=[SECTOR], jumps=5, owner=[OWNER] end $attempts = 0 skip if ! $temp @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$temp end
* wait around for abit before continuing if [DOCKEDAT] @ = wait randomly from 10000 to 20000 ms else $temp = random value from 10000 to 20000 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> move around $temp ms end
if is a new script version available START [THIS] -> delayed command COMMAND_FREETRADER : arg1=null, arg2=null, arg3=null, arg4=null return null end
skip if $bSellAt -> exists $turns = 0
* lets find a new station to sell at (Dock) if $turns <= 0 $turns = 3 $true.owner = [THIS] -> get true owner $flags = [Find.DockingAllowed] | [Find.Random] if $true.owner == Pirates $bSellAt = find station in galaxy: startsector=[SECTOR] class or type=Pirate Dock race=Pirates flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] serial=null max.jumps=$buyrange num=1 else if [OWNER] != Teladi AND [OWNER] != NMMC if not random value from 0 to 4 - 1 $bSellAt = [THIS] -> find nearest military outpost else if random value from 0 to 3 - 1 $bSellAt = find station in galaxy: startsector=[SECTOR] class or type=Equipment Dock race=[OWNER] flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] serial=null max.jumps=$buyrange num=1 else if random value from 0 to 3 - 1 $bSellAt = find station in galaxy: startsector=[SECTOR] class or type=Trading Dock race=[OWNER] flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] serial=null max.jumps=$buyrange num=1 else $bSellAt = find station in galaxy: startsector=[SECTOR] class or type=Dock race=[OWNER] flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] serial=null max.jumps=$buyrange num=1 end end
if ( ! $bSellAt AND ! $target.race ) OR [OWNER] == Teladi OR [OWNER] == NMMC if not random value from 0 to 4 - 1 $bSellAt = [THIS] -> find nearest military outpost else if random value from 0 to 3 - 1 $bSellAt = find station in galaxy: startsector=[SECTOR] class or type=Equipment Dock race=$target.race flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] serial=null max.jumps=$buyrange num=1 else if random value from 0 to 3 - 1 $bSellAt = find station in galaxy: startsector=[SECTOR] class or type=Trading Dock race=$target.race flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] serial=null max.jumps=$buyrange num=1 else $bSellAt = find station in galaxy: startsector=[SECTOR] class or type=Dock race=$target.race flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] serial=null max.jumps=$buyrange num=1 end end
end end
* ============================ * Starting main routine * ============================ dec $turns = skip if $bSellAt continue $owner = $bSellAt -> get owner race do if $owner == Player continue $noto = [THIS] -> get notoriety to race $owner skip if $noto >= 0 continue
$attempts = 0 $exclude = array alloc: size=1 $exclude[0] = $bSellAt
@ = wait randomly from 500 to 1000 ms $bBuyAt = null $bIndex = null $BuyAt = null
$chk.wares = get warearray for [THIS] $waresize = size of array $chk.wares if not $waresize $chk.wares = $bSellAt -> get tradeable ware array from station $waresize = size of array $chk.wares end
* What !? no wares, lets try again skip if $waresize continue
* compute amounts of wares we wish to buy $tradeables = array alloc: size=0 $tradeables.buy = array alloc: size=0 while $waresize dec $waresize = @ = wait 100 ms $ware = $chk.wares[$waresize] skip if $bSellAt -> trades with ware $ware continue skip if [THIS] -> can transport ware $ware continue
* already got ware in cargo bay, skip it do if [THIS] -> get true amount of ware $ware in cargo bay continue
* we need some free space to carry the wares skip if [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay continue
* pirates shouln't care about illegeal trading $owner = [THIS] -> get true owner if $owner != Pirates do if is ware $ware illegal in $owner sectors continue end
* ok, its the correct ware $freeamount = $bSellAt -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $maxAmount = $bSellAt -> get max amount of ware $ware that can be stored in cargo bay $factor = $maxAmount / 3 - $freeamount if not $factor <= 0 continue end
* lets compute the amount needed $temp = random value from 0 to $maxAmount - 1 $factor = ( - $factor ) + $temp / 3 append $factor to array $tradeables.buy append $ware to array $tradeables end
* seems we have no wares, best try that again if not size of array $tradeables $turns = 0 continue end
@ = wait randomly from 500 to 1000 ms
* hmm, we've lost our target station?? skip if $bSellAt -> exists continue
* ============================ * Lets start to find places to buy this crap from * ============================
* If pirates, then look for another pirate dock to trade with if [OWNER] == Pirates $flags = [Find.Random] | [Find.DockingAllowed] $trys = 10 $jumps = [THIS] -> get job jump range while $trys dec $trys = $bBuyAt = find station in galaxy: startsector=[SECTOR] class or type=Pirate Dock race=[OWNER] flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] serial=null max.jumps=$jumps if $bBuyAt -> exists skip if $bSellAt == $bBuyAt break end inc $jumps = end gosub sub.MoveToBuy do if $ret.Failed continue
* Otherwise, look for any station we can buy each need ware from else while size of array $tradeables [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_FREETRADER @ = wait 100 ms skip if $bSellAt -> exists break $bIndex = size of array $tradeables $bIndex = random value from 0 to $bIndex - 1 gosub sub.FindBuyAt if not $ret.Station -> exists remove element from array $tradeables at index $bIndex remove element from array $tradeables.buy at index $bIndex continue end $bBuyAt = $ret.Station $ware = $tradeables[$bIndex] [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_GET_WARE target=$ware target2=$bBuyAt par1=null par2=null gosub sub.MoveToBuy * check if we havn't removed the ware (unable to buy, prevent looping) $bIndex = get index of $ware in array $tradeables offset=-1 + 1 if $bIndex >= 0 remove element from array $tradeables at index $bIndex remove element from array $tradeables.buy at index $bIndex end [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_FREETRADER end end
* we should have all the wares we need now, lets go and sell them skip if $bSellAt -> exists continue [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_SELL_WARE target=$ware target2=$bSellAt par1=null par2=null gosub sub.MoveToSell [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_FREETRADER gosub sub.CheckHull end return null
* ================================ * SUB: Find a station to buy wares at * ================================ sub.FindBuyAt: $ret.Station = null $jumps = [THIS] -> get job jump range $ware = $tradeables[$bIndex] $amount = $tradeables[$bIndex] $maxAmount = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay skip if $maxAmount > $amount $amount = $maxAmount $price = $bSellAt -> get price of ware $ware
$trys = 5 if $target.race $trys = 10 $jumps = $jumps - $trys skip if $jumps > 2 $jumps = 2 end
while $trys dec $trys = $BuyAt = find station: product $ware with best price depend on jumps: max.price=$price, amount=$amount, max.jumps=$jumps, startsector=[SECTOR], trader=[THIS], exclude array=$exclude if $BuyAt -> exists $station.owner = $BuyAt -> get owner race if $target.race AND $station.owner != $target.race append $BuyAt to array $exclude $BuyAt = null end end
if not $BuyAt -> exists $price = get max price of ware $ware as secondary resource $BuyAt = find station: product $ware with best price depend on jumps: max.price=$price, amount=$amount, max.jumps=$jumps, startsector=[SECTOR], trader=[THIS], exclude array=$exclude end if $BuyAt -> exists $station.owner = $BuyAt -> get owner race if $target.race AND $station.owner != $target.race append $BuyAt to array $exclude $BuyAt = null end end
do if $BuyAt -> exists break
inc $jumps = end do if $BuyAt -> exists $ret.Station = $BuyAt endsub
* ================================ * SUB: fly to station to sell all wares * ================================ sub.MoveToSell: skip if $bSellAt -> exists endsub
gosub sub.Refuel
[THIS] ->set destination to $bSellAt @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$bSellAt [THIS] ->set destination to null
@ = wait randomly from 2000 to 5000 ms
skip if $bSellAt -> exists endsub skip if $bSellAt == [DOCKEDAT] endsub gosub sub.Sell endsub
* ================================ * SUB: Buy any needed wares from docked * ================================ sub.Buy: if [DOCKEDAT] -> exists if $tradeables if [DOCKEDAT] -> is of class Factory $products = [DOCKEDAT] -> get products $p = size of array $products while $p dec $p = $ware = $products[$p] $waresize = get index of $ware in array $tradeables offset=-1 + 1 if $waresize > -1 gosub sub.BuyWare end end else $waresize = size of array $tradeables while $waresize dec $waresize = $ware = $tradeables[$waresize] $amount = $tradeables.buy[$waresize]
skip if $waresize mod 5 @ = wait 100 ms gosub sub.BuyWare end end end end endsub
sub.BuyWare: skip if $amount endsub skip if [DOCKEDAT] -> can sell ware $ware endsub skip if [DOCKEDAT] -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay endsub $bought = [THIS] -> buy $amount units of $ware if $bought remove element from array $tradeables at index $waresize remove element from array $tradeables.buy at index $waresize end endsub
* ================================ * SUB: Sell all our goods at the target station * ================================ sub.Sell: if [DOCKEDAT] -> exists $warearray = [THIS] -> get tradeable ware array from ship if $warearray $waresize = size of array $warearray while $waresize dec $waresize = skip if $waresize mod 5 @ = wait 100 ms $ware = $warearray[$waresize] skip if [DOCKEDAT] -> can buy ware $ware continue $amount = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware $ware in cargo bay do if $amount > 0 $sold = [THIS] -> sell $amount units of $ware end $dummy = [THIS] -> wait idle rate minimum:30000 ms [THIS] ->reset flight time end end $warearray = null endsub
return null
* ================================ * SUB: Move to station to buy from * ================================ sub.MoveToBuy: $ret.Failed = [TRUE] skip if $bBuyAt -> exists endsub
gosub sub.Refuel
skip if $bBuyAt -> exists endsub
[THIS] ->set destination to $bBuyAt @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$bBuyAt [THIS] ->set destination to null skip if $bBuyAt -> exists endsub
skip if $bBuyAt == [DOCKEDAT] endsub
$ret.Failed = [FALSE] gosub sub.Buy endsub
* ================================ * ================================ sub.Refuel: if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay $got.energy = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $needed = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=10 if $needed > $got.energy $needed = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=40 $needed = $needed - $got.energy @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.resupply.self : Ware to Resupply=Energy Cells Quantity=$needed Max Fly Range=3 @ = wait randomly from 5000 to 10000 ms @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock : @ = wait 500 ms end end endsub
* ================================ * SUB: Check hull integeraty * ================================ sub.CheckHull: $temp = [THIS] -> get hull percent if $temp < 80 gosub sub.Refuel @ = [THIS] -> call script !ship.cmd.moverepair.std : fly to this and repair=null [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_FREETRADER end endsub
* changelog: * 5: changed bestbuy/bestsell * 6: Rewritten (Cycrow) * 6: Added pirate dock trading TS return null
